title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4025.14 - Delayed entries
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4025.14 - Delayed entries

State Regulations

The list of entries for all other races shall be closed
at the advertised time and no entry shall be admitted after that time unless
the nominator can prove to the stewards that the entry was mailed before the
advertised time of closing; and starters must be named through the entry box by
the usual time of closing on the day preceding the race unless otherwise
designated by the stewards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4025.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
